faq_class_types_question: What types of classes do you offer?
faq_class_types_answer:
We offer flexible options for every learning style and budget:

• Group Classes (8-20 Students): Our most cost-effective choice for an interactive and social learning experience.

• Small Group Classes (1-on-2 or 1-on-3): A perfect balance of personal attention and peer motivation. Ideal for learning with friends.

• 1-on-1 Customized Courses: Fully tailored to your personal goals and schedule for the fastest and most efficient progress.

about_intro: We're passionate about connecting cultures through language learning. Since our founding, we've helped thousands of students discover the joy of speaking Spanish while building bridges across Spanish-speaking countries and the world.
our_story_p1: SpeakNow Spanish Institute was born from a simple belief: learning Spanish should be engaging, practical, and deeply connected to the rich Spanish-speaking cultures. Founded by a team of passionate educators and native speakers, we saw the need for personalized, high-quality Spanish instruction that goes beyond textbooks.
our_story_p2: What started as a small group of teachers sharing their love for the Spanish language has grown into a comprehensive online institute. We've maintained our core values: authentic cultural immersion, personalized attention, and practical communication skills that you can use from day one.
our_story_p3: Today, we're proud to offer courses for all levels, from complete beginners to advanced speakers looking to perfect their fluency. Our students come from many different backgrounds, united by their desire to connect with Spanish-speaking cultures around the world.
mission_text: To make Spanish learning accessible, enjoyable, and culturally enriching for students worldwide. We believe everyone deserves the opportunity to communicate confidently in Spanish and connect with the vibrant Spanish-speaking cultures.
vision_text: To be the leading platform for authentic Spanish education, fostering global understanding and cultural appreciation. We envision a world where language barriers don't limit personal and professional opportunities.
authenticity_desc: All our teachers are native speakers who bring genuine cultural insights and real-world experience to every lesson.
personalization_desc: Every student is unique. We tailor our teaching methods to match your learning style, goals, and interests.
growth_desc: We believe in lifelong learning - for our students and ourselves. We continuously improve our methods and embrace new technologies.
cultural_bridge_desc: Language is a gateway to culture. We help students understand and appreciate the diversity of Spanish-speaking countries.
practical_focus_desc: We prioritize communication skills you can use immediately - whether for travel, work, or personal connections.
support_desc: Your success is our success. We provide ongoing encouragement and support throughout your entire learning journey.
team_intro: Our diverse team of native Spanish speakers brings together decades of teaching experience from various Spanish-speaking countries. Each instructor is passionate about sharing their language and culture with students worldwide.
maria_bio: With over 15 years of teaching experience, María founded SpeakNow to share her passion for Mexican culture and Spanish language. She specializes in conversational Spanish and business communication.
carlos_bio: Carlos brings the rich cultural heritage of Argentina to his lessons. A literature graduate with 12 years of teaching experience, he excels at helping advanced students perfect their fluency and cultural understanding.
ana_bio: Ana specializes in beginner and intermediate Spanish, with a focus on practical communication skills. Her patient and encouraging teaching style has helped hundreds of students build confidence in speaking Spanish.
diego_bio: Diego combines his background in linguistics with his love for Peruvian culture to create engaging, interactive lessons. He specializes in grammar instruction and DELE exam preparation.
